Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~jjjjibm please do let me know if need any help to create job in Jenkins.

Action.author: jjjjibm
Action.body: Chris, what exactly should the Jenkins job do?

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: ~ChristopherFerris ~jjjjibm : I have created a new job in Jenkins for fabric-node-sdk-unit-tests on v0.6 branch. We will create a new job for fabric-node-sdk repo once it is functional.

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Have submitted patch set in ci-management for this task. In-review https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1807/
